entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 6:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
